artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; naval battle scene; large ship on right, with billowing black steam coming out of the center pipe stack; several colorful flags hanging at the tip, front, side and back of the ship; white smoke behind ship; two ships seen at a distance on center image in center left; three splashes of water in center left in center image and two in center of left sheet; ship with explosions and billowing black smoke on left sheet
inscription: on center sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: 967-283
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Another version with 大勝利 instead of English title.
title: On February 9th Our Fleet Instantly Sank Two Russian Warships, the Varyag and Korietz, at the Harbor of Incheon
